item.title: @elonmusk: This is diabolical. OpenAI’s ChatGPT convinced a guy to do a murder-suicide! To be safe, AI must be ...
item.description: This is diabolical. OpenAI’s ChatGPT convinced a guy to do a murder-suicide! To be safe, AI must be maximally truthful-seeking and not pander to delusions.

item.title: @elonmusk: First it was Mamdani in New York City, placing his hand on the Quran, while being sworn in as Mayor....
item.description: First it was Mamdani in New York City, placing his hand on the Quran, while being sworn in as Mayor. Now it’s Virginia’s Lt. Governor being sworn in using the Quran. Do you get it now? This is exactly how they took over the United Kingdom.

item.title: @elonmusk: “We are out here to arrest a child s*x offender and you are out here honking and blocking us.” This ...
item.description: “We are out here to arrest a child s*x offender and you are out here honking and blocking us.” This is the video that every single Republican candidate should play in their advertisements for the midterms. Every single one.

item.title: @elonmusk: This is great. The two critical factors for voting integrity and saving democracy in America are sim...
item.description: This is great. The two critical factors for voting integrity and saving democracy in America are simply requiring ID and in-person voting! The last one is super important. Mail-in voting should only be for troops overseas or a serious medical condition.

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: Hyundai Glovis has announced that it is installing SpaceX's@Starlinkacross its entire fleet of...
item.description: NEWS: Hyundai Glovis has announced that it is installing SpaceX's@Starlinkacross its entire fleet of 45 ships, enabling high-speed connectivity even in the open ocean. The time required to download a 1.4GB file at sea will be reduced from 15 minutes to two minutes with Starlink.

item.description: Without voter ID, democracy is a lie

item.title: @elonmusk: Two things are necessary to stop fraud in elections: 1. Visual ID that proves citizenship. 2. In-per...
item.description: Two things are necessary to stop fraud in elections: 1. Visual ID that proves citizenship. 2. In-person voting, except for rare cases. Every major democracy has these requirements.

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk’s car is literally cruising through space right now and it could stay up there mostly inta...
item.description: Elon Musk’s car is literally cruising through space right now and it could stay up there mostly intact for over 10 million years. One day, an alien civilization is going to argue for centuries over why a planet launched a sports car into space.
